title: How Nature & Other Physical Environments Impact Your Focus, Cognition & Health | Dr. Marc Berman

where we discuss science and
science-based tools for everyday life.
I'm Andrew Huberman and I'm a professor
of neurobiology and opthalmology at
Stanford School of Medicine. My guest

Burman is a professor of psychology at

attention restoration theory, which

science-based strategies that anyone can
